column5: knowing some big rain was comin headed out again last night!!! got out around 7:30 till 2am!! beauty night again with the moon lighting everything up and even a pack a coyotes runnin by!!! the steel was abit more aggressive tonight and fish were more bigger!!! all droppies but 1. caught 1 fresh one and i watched 4 freshes move in all night!!! better late then never  lol
some real nice fish! Thanks for posting.

Hey Scott!  Awesome job out there yet again!  It's nice to hear that some fresh steel is still coming up the tribs.  Bly and I were out last night too, but since I had to be up at 530am (some of us have to work....haha), we only stayed from 9 til 10:15...I know...not the prime time, but at least we got one....LOL.
ANY TIME ON THE WATER IS GOOD TIME SPENT BRO!!!!WEEKEND AINT LOOKIN GOOD WEATHER WISE!!!!
Merry Springmas CC nice juicy steel.WTG
Nice fish! hopefully the 20% chance of showers over the weekend holds and the 12deg. temps increase a bit. Good fishing weather! Good luck to all that will get out this weekend.  Easton
